data.title: Ken Block drives and drifts through the ultimate exotic playground - Dubai
data.description: Ken Block shows us anything is possible in Gymkhana 8, presented by Ford Performance, XDubai and Hoonigan. Drifting around planes, racing a Bugatti Veyron and driving through sand dunes, he takes us on an unimaginable tour of Dubai.

data.title: Does Anybody Still Race 10/10ths These Days? - /SHAKEDOWN
data.description: Max Seeger of FastLaneDaily and /DRIVE asks Leo Parente of ShakeDown who asks you-If driving 10/10th is still part of racing these days. Typically, SD brings you evidence and examples, asks your opinion, then seeks your nominations for racers that best embody 10/10th racing. From any generation, any racing discipline.

data.title: How and Why Motorcycle Lane Splitting is Safe and Good - /RideApart
data.description:
Motorcycles riding between cars! Calm down, the legal practice of lane splitting saves car drivers time and money by reducing overall congestion while allowing motorcycles to take charge of their own safety. Here's why everyone, including car drivers, should support legal lane splitting.

Jamie and a Triumph Street Triple are joined by Harlan Flagg of electric motorcycle dealer Hollywood Electrics and Wes returns from injury on a Suzuki GSX-R600.

asset.title: How and Why Motorcycle Lane Splitting is Safe and Good - /RideApart
asset.description:
Motorcycles riding between cars! Calm down, the legal practice of lane splitting saves car drivers time and money by reducing overall congestion while allowing motorcycles to take charge of their own safety. Here's why everyone, including car drivers, should support legal lane splitting.

Jamie and a Triumph Street Triple are joined by Harlan Flagg of electric motorcycle dealer Hollywood Electrics and Wes returns from injury on a Suzuki GSX-R600.

For more on motorcycles, check out http://RideApart.com

data.title: SDHQ's Twin-Turbo Eco-Raptor - /TUNED
data.description: The Raptor is an amazing truck worthy of an amazing engine. While the standard 6.2L mill is no slouch, it's far from high tech and eats gas like no other. This is the Raptor review Ford doesn't want you to see: the Super Duty Headquartters Ecoboost-powered Raptor.

data.title: Triplex Suspension Explained - /Inside Koenigsegg
data.description:
Episode 2 of 9, Triplex Suspension Explained

Inside Koenigsegg provides for the first time, a look behind the scenes at Koenigsegg and examine how innovation within the highest echelon of sports car manufacturers will affect the broader automotive world. Company founder and principal, Christian Von Koenigsegg, hosts this nine-part series, which was produced at Koenigsegg headquarters in Angelholm, Sweden.

In the second episode, Christian Von Koenigsegg explains how the innovative design of the Triplex Suspension system allows for no compromises between traction, handling, stability and comfort on the road or track.

data.title: E30 BMW M3: Most Overhyped Classic? - AFTER/DRIVE
data.description:
The 1986-1991 BMW M3 is blowing up, rocketing 27% in value since last year. Is it the most overhyped classic car of our generation, or an icon worth every inflated penny and more? Today's AFTER/DRIVE panel is everything E30.

data.title: Morgan Three Wheeler and Caterham Seven: Brilliant British Flyweights - /CHRIS HARRIS ON CARS
data.description: They're small, light, fast and deliver the most singular driving experiences. We take them to some beautiful UK roads and discover why they offer something even the latest hypercars simply cannot match.

data.title: Formula Ford EcoBoost. Street Legal Racer on Road and Nürburgring - /CHRIS HARRIS ON CARS
data.description: You see, big car companies can have a sense of humour! Take a Formula Ford racer, add a tuned 1 litre 3cyl motor with over 200hp and you have a car which ace racer Nick Tandy got around the Ring in 7min 22sec. That's special, but even more special when it's on the public highway.
